custom_fields.label: Delivery Type
custom_fields.name: Delivery Trip-custom_delivery_type
custom_fields.options:
Own Transport
External Transport
Self Pickup
Courier
Return Load
Other Purpose
Material Transfer

custom_fields.depends_on: eval:doc.custom_delivery_type=="Other Purpose" || doc.custom_delivery_type=="Return Load" || doc.custom_delivery_type=="External Transport"
custom_fields.label: Purpose
custom_fields.name: Delivery Trip-custom_purpose

Mukesh Ambani Transport
PGT Transport
Porter
Rehoboth Transport
Sri Vishnu Transport

Own Transport

property_setters.name: Delivery Trip-custom_source-options
property_setters.value:

Kms Transport

Porter

property_setters.name: Delivery Trip-driver-mandatory_depends_on
property_setters.value:
eval:doc.custom_delivery_type=='Own Transport' || doc.custom_delivery_type=="Other Purpose" || 
doc.custom_delivery_type=="Return Load"
